Chroma Squad is a tactical RPG about five stunt actors who decide to quit their jobs and start their own Power Rangers-inspired TV show! Cast actors, purchase equipment and upgrades for your studio, craft weapons and giant Mechas out of cardboard and duct tape.


Ã¢â€”ï¿½Customize your TV studio: hire actors, upgrade your gear, do marketing, craft weapons, costumes and giant cardboard robots!

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Tactical RPG combat with a twist: combine your heroesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ abilities with Teamwork maneuvers!

Ã¢â€”ï¿½In-Depth RPG systems with skill trees, random equipment, crafting, and branching storyline with 3 different endings!

Ã¢â€”ï¿½A love letter to Power Rangers, Tokusatsu and the Japanese series of our childhoods!
